title: Pfizer's Hospira recalls anesthetic after finding 'visible' particulate during annual inspection
author: Joseph Keenan
description: Hospira, a subsidiary of Pfizer, issued a voluntary recall for one lot of the anesthetic propofol after discovering "a visible particulate" in a vial during an annual inspection. | Hospira, a subsidiary of Pfizer, issued a voluntary recall for one lot of the anesthetic propofol after discovering "a visible particulate" in a vial during an annual inspection.
